code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[loginError,setLoginError]=useState('');const handleLogin=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:3000/login",{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Error:\n        ".concat(response.statusText));}const{token}=await response.json();localStorage.setItem('jwt',token);window.location.pathname="/create";}catch(error){setLoginError('Failed to login.
